sentences.sentence: "Our babies are being born pre-polluted," says Sharyle Patton of Commonweal, which cosponsored "Is It in Us?".
sentences.translation: “我们的婴儿出生前就受到了污染。”公益组织的 Sharyle Patton 说道，这个公益组织共同赞助了项目“Is it in Us？”。

sentences.sentence: We can take part in some commonweal activities to plant more trees, for the trees are good to our environment.
sentences.translation: 我们可以参加一些公益活动来植更多的树，因为树对我们的环境有好处。

sentences.sentence: By that time, the topic of my commonweal salon will be changed.
sentences.translation: 到那时候，我的公益沙龙内容就会有新变化了。
